subject: junit 3.8.1  and eclipse 3.2
msgSnippet: I am trying to run my testcases in eclipses using junit 3.8.1 I am getting the runtime exeception saying java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Error: parameter
messageBody:
I am trying to run my testcases in eclipses using junit 3.8.1
I am getting the runtime exeception saying

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Error: parameter '-port' not specified
at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.defaultInit(RemoteTestRunner.java:299)
at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.init(RemoteTestRunner.java:210)
at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.main(RemoteTestRunner.java:195)

any idea why this is happening, no pblm at compiletime though.
